title: Brand new to the game, is there anywhere I can meet and talk to more experienced players?
body:
I was just wondering if there was like a discord server or something where more experienced players can teach people new to the game like me how to play properly. The in game team chat only does so much as typing is hard in the heat of getting your ass kicked by the enemy champions lol. I really want to improve as I am enjoying the game a lot when I play against other new players and bots, not so much when my team is disappointed in me from failing to run away and feeding the enemy smurf ;w;

If anyone knows a place I can find people to play with to learn how to play better please let me know! I do have a few friends with smurf accounts but they can only play so often so I'd like to find others to play with to.

Also if you have any tips or information just to leave in the comments I would really appreciate that too, any advice is helpful!

P.S. I am currently learning Ahri {{champion:103}}  and Ekko {{champion:245}}  playing mid, not very good at them so far but I really enjoy them so I hope to get better c:

replies.body:
Order of things to do:
1- Watch youtube videos about basic tips/guides/tricks.
2- Play the game and get used to it.
3- Try to read the abilities every single character has.
4- Read the mobafire guides of the champions you want to play (p.s. this is a good one: http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/build/elusive-ferrets-super-in-depth-ahri-guide-409690
5- Watch livestreams of challenger players. I prefer watching one tricks who know how to use the champions I use.
6- Memories rough damage values and cooldowns of all characters' abilities.
7- Experience.
a tip would be to probably learn simpler champions, or rather focus on learning the game and how to get objectives rather than how to master your champion
